docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 28.--Although the delegates and the Uruguayan authorities are reluctant to admit the failure of the tri-partite economic conference, all hopes of accomplishing its major objectives vanished this morning when part of the Argentine delegation returned to Buenos Aires.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Dec. 29.--With the establishment of order at Vallenar, Copiapo and other points where Communist activities broke out Christmas Eve and nearly fifty persons died in armed clashes, the authorities are now actively investigating...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Dec. 29.--With the establishment of order at Vallenar, Copiapo and other points where Communist activities broke out Christmas Eve and nearly fifty persons died in armed clashes, the authorities are now actively investigating connections in the more important centres.
